channel.title: Need Album Art Maker! :)
channel.description:
Hi! My band and I have created our first album and since none of us are capable of creating a legitimate album cover, we are dependent on you!
Our band name is "IevaLaveI" without the quotes.
The album is named "Dance of Frost"
I would like our band name to go at top-center and in white coloring with an elegant font. (please make it very soft)
I would like the album name to go in the bottom right corner in the same font as the band name, however a bit darker in color.
I would prefer the background to be from top to bottom: a night sky, the moon in the vanishing point of the art, a large amount of dead trees somewhat covering the moon and the entire middle of the art, at the bottom, let there be the beginning of a puddle and the end of the image cuts it off. (i would like the puddle to have a reflection of the moon and trees please)
Alright if anyone is able to do this, I will be in their debt greatly. <3 to all.

item.title: Need Album Art Maker! :)
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:535072”][quote author=I_Hybrid_I link=topic=653870.msg4381381#msg4381381 date=1383677382]
Add my skype: officialzephyr
I would love to do this for you
[/quote]

Balls. I don’t have a Skype. Give me a download link however from Mediafire, Dropbox etc. That would be very great thank you![/quote]

Balls, i need something to keep contact with you for ma motivation

Read full topic
